channel.title: Runescape Banning Question?
channel.description: ok if runescape bans my ip, for macroeing or somthing, can i change my ip and use another account that was created on that ip that was banned? Just curious because i wanna macro on one account and still keep the other if the one macroing gets banned.

item.title: Runescape Banning Question?
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:6, topic:214132”][quote author=billygotshot link=topic=281790.msg2289683#msg2289683 date=1214090415]

Jagex have never mentioned IP banning and there have never been any report of people becoming IP banned. If however this were to happen, usually dependant on your ISP you can change your IP address simply by unplugging and then plugging in your router/modem.

people have been ip banned… I recall one on sythe.org. - someone posted a picture or something of jagex saying he was ip banned.
[/quote]
Durial321 was IP banned also.

I doubt it though, i think jagex would let you have another chance at playing right… that is, unless you have been caught with multiple accounts.[/quote]

he was not ip banned. There was no reason to ip ban him. He accidently found a glitch and abused it. His account was banned. Unless you can prove he was ip banned.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape Banning Question?
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

Their was some scammer a while ago, his name was either Curt or Luke… think it was Luke… who claimed to be ip banned on Sythe.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape Banning Question?
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“billygotshot, post:4, topic:214132”][quote author=davidude36 link=topic=281790.msg2289146#msg2289146 date=1214066875]
Jagex have never mentioned IP banning and there have never been any report of people becoming IP banned. If however this were to happen, usually dependant on your ISP you can change your IP address simply by unplugging and then plugging in your router/modem.
[/quote]

people have been ip banned… I recall one on sythe.org. - someone posted a picture or something of jagex saying he was ip banned.[/quote]
Durial321 was IP banned also.

I doubt it though, i think jagex would let you have another chance at playing right… that is, unless you have been caught with multiple accounts.

Read full topic
